Pre-Game Insights: The Baltimore Orioles are leading the series 1-0 against the Colorado Rockies.
The Orioles have the top team slugging percentage in the majors at.442.
The Rockies have a 50-86 overall record and a 31-36 record in home games with a collective batting average of.245.

Injuries for both teams could impact the game.
